home-page.title: Your partner in digital accessibility
home-page.description: Together with you, we're making the whole world digitally accessible and inclusive. We help these industries secure digital accessibility:

features.eaa: All help with the European Accessibility Act

cognitief.title: Experience what it's like to have ADHD
cognitief.subtitle: While writing the email, distracting pop-ups and animations similar to thoughts of ADHD appear.

form.title: Write an email
form.subtitle: Write an email to your teacher, reporting that you're late for today's lesson.
form.name: To
form.subject: Subject

motorisch.title: Experience what it's like to have Cerebral Palsy
motorisch.subtitle: While selecting the different input fields, your cursor moves all over the place.

form.title: Enter your data
form.subtitle: Fill in (fake) data to complete the payment
form.name: Name

welkom-pagina.title: Welcome to the Experience Square!
welkom-pagina.heading: Today, you step into the shoes of people who face daily obstacles on the internet.
welkom-pagina.paragraaf: From visual impairments to motor disabilities. Each of the five stations lets you experience firsthand how important digital accessibility is.
welkom-pagina.finalText: At the end, you’ll get tips on how you can improve your website.

visuele.paragraaf: This mini-game lets you experience what it's like to have visual impairments.
visuele.subtekst: Below you see a layout of a cinema.

auditieve.title: Experience Auditory Impairment
auditieve.subtext: This simulation lets you experience what it’s like to hear with an auditory impairment.
auditieve.subtext1: This will adjust the clarity of the announcement
auditieve.omschrijving1: Most sounds are very quiet or inaudible
auditieve.omschrijving3: Some sounds may be harder to distinguish
auditieve.omschrijving4: (This can only be listened to after one playback)
auditieve.subtext2: Pay close attention to the platform change information
auditieve.subtext3: Which platform were you instructed to go to according to the announcement?
auditieve.subtext4: This simulation shows how hearing difficulties can affect understanding important announcements in public spaces.
auditieve.subtext5: This simulation shows how important clear communication is for people with hearing impairments in public spaces.
